sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Couponium is innovative because it transforms coupons‚Äîone of the most widely used marketing tools in the world‚Äîinto verifiable, single-use, transferable blockchain assets, while remaining simple enough for any local business to use. Existing coupon apps are fragmented, closed-source, easily duplicated, and provide no transparency or trust. NFT marketplaces exist, but they focus almost entirely on collectibles and speculation rather than real-world promotional utility. Couponium bridges a major gap by applying blockchain‚Äôs strengths to a real commercial need that millions of businesses already understand: coupons that bring customers through the door.



Unlike previous blockchain coupon experiments, Couponium avoids complexity and speculation by using ADA as the sole currency. There is no platform token, no liquidity pool, no investment narrative, and no regulatory risk. This makes Couponium one of the first Cardano projects deliberately built for high-volume real-world adoption, not token sales. Businesses mint coupons using ADA, consumers purchase them with ADA, and redemption is verified by burning the NFT on-chain‚Äîsolving fraud, duplication, and misuse instantly.



The Market Manager Program is another layer of innovation. Instead of relying on top-down marketing, Couponium empowers community members to act as decentralized business-acquisition partners. Market Managers earn 75% of all platform fees generated by the businesses they onboard‚Äîpaid automatically in ADA via smart contract. This creates a self-sustaining, decentralized onboarding engine capable of scaling across cities and industries. No other coupon system or Web3 project uses this grassroots incentive model to grow adoption at the local level.



Lastly, Couponium is built with MVP simplicity and future extensibility in mind. While the initial version focuses on minting, listing, and redeeming coupons, the architecture enables future expansion into loyalty programs, AI-generated coupons, coupon recycling, subscription bundles, and analytics dashboards. Its innovative combination of simplicity, transparency, openness, ADA utility, and real-world use cases makes Couponium unlike anything currently in the Cardano ecosystem‚Äîor the global coupon market.

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
The Couponium MVP will demonstrate a fully functional end-to-end coupon lifecycle using ADA and Cardano NFTs, accessible through a modern web interface. The MVP will show businesses how to create and mint coupons on the blockchain, list them in a marketplace, and redeem them in-store using QR verification. This proves that blockchain can solve real-world problems without adding friction or requiring users to understand smart contracts, tokens, or technical concepts.



The prototype will include three main portals:



1. Business Dashboard (Web App)



Businesses can:



Create coupon offers (value, expiration, quantity)



Mint coupon NFTs using ADA



Publish coupons to the marketplace



Track sales and redemption analytics



Redeem coupons by scanning consumer QR codes



This demonstrates practical utility: a small business can use Cardano within minutes.



2. Consumer Marketplace (Web App)



Consumers will:



Browse live coupons from local businesses



Buy coupons using ADA



View coupons stored in their connected wallet



Redeem coupons in-store using a redemption QR screen



See burn confirmation after use



This shows how NFTs can function as real coupons rather than collectibles.



3. Market Manager Portal



Market Managers can:



Register through a simple onboarding process



Add new businesses



View their referred businesses



Track ADA earnings



Monitor real usage and activity



Receive automated fee-splits from the smart contract



This demonstrates a reproducible, decentralized go-to-market engine.



Smart Contracts (Testnet & Mainnet)



The MVP will launch first on Cardano testnet for validation, and then on mainnet upon milestone completion. Users will be able to test:



NFT minting



ADA payments



Automated fee splitting



QR redemption and NFT burning



Where It Can Be Accessed



The MVP will be deployed as a responsive web application accessible publicly at:



[https://couponium\.app](https://couponium.app)

 (placeholder domain)



Businesses, consumers, and Market Managers will access it through a browser and connect via Cardano wallets such as Lace, Nami, or Eternl. Documentation, demo videos, onboarding guides, test data, and walkthroughs will be openly provided.



The MVP ultimately demonstrates that Cardano can power real-world commerce at local scale, delivering trusted coupon redemption, transparent earnings, and decentralized growth through Market Managers‚Äîall using ADA only.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
Couponium solves the core problems faced by small businesses and consumers by turning coupons into Cardano NFT assets that are easy to create, purchase, track, and redeem‚Äîusing ADA only. This removes the complexity, fragmentation, and fraud issues that plague traditional coupon systems while enabling real-world utility for Cardano.



Businesses use a simple dashboard to create coupon offers and mint them as NFTs through an ADA payment. These NFTs are listed automatically in a marketplace where consumers can browse and purchase them using ADA. When redeemed in-store, the business scans a QR code that verifies ownership and burns the coupon NFT via a smart contract, guaranteeing single-use redemption and eliminating fraud, duplicates, and screenshot abuse.



To ensure rapid real-world adoption, Couponium introduces a Market Manager Program. Market Managers are community members who onboard local businesses and earn 75% of all platform fees generated by those businesses. This decentralized incentive model solves the biggest adoption challenge‚Äîgetting real businesses onto the platform‚Äîwithout requiring a large corporate sales force. It also creates new income opportunities for the Cardano community and helps spread ADA usage organically across cities.



The MVP consists of three smart contracts (minting, marketplace, redemption), a clean web interface for businesses and consumers, and a dedicated portal for Market Managers. AI tools significantly reduce development time and cost, allowing the project to deliver full functionality on a lean budget while maintaining security and quality.



By providing a simple, transparent, fraud-proof, and incentive-driven coupon marketplace, Couponium directly addresses the needs of businesses, consumers, and the Cardano ecosystem‚Äîunlocking practical, daily ADA utility in the real world.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Couponium will create meaningful, measurable, and lasting impact for the Cardano community by driving real-world usage of ADA and showcasing how blockchain can solve everyday problems for businesses and consumers. While many blockchain projects focus on speculation or niche technical use cases, Couponium provides a practical tool that any local business can adopt with zero blockchain knowledge. This helps bridge the gap between Web2 businesses and Web3 capabilities, showing Cardano as a reliable and accessible platform for real commerce.



The project encourages daily ADA transactions as businesses mint coupons, consumers purchase them, and Market Managers earn fees. This increases wallet activity, transaction volume, and visibility of ADA as a functional payment asset. Every action‚Äîminting, buying, burning‚Äîcreates on-chain events that contribute to the health and utility of the ecosystem.



One of the biggest impacts is the Market Manager Program, which empowers Cardano community members to become local ambassadors who onboard businesses into the ecosystem. This decentralizes growth and removes reliance on traditional marketing or corporate partnerships. It creates income opportunities for community members and spreads real-world Cardano adoption across cities, industries, and customer bases‚Äîsomething no other coupon or NFT marketplace currently offers.



Couponium also demonstrates the power of Cardano NFTs beyond art or collectibles by using them for verifiable, single-use coupons. This introduces millions of potential users to a new category of blockchain utility. By making NFTs functional, simple, and valuable to everyday people, Couponium strengthens Cardano‚Äôs reputation as a platform built for real financial and commercial solutions.



Over time, this project can inspire additional innovations such as AI-generated promotions, loyalty programs, identity-enabled coupon targeting, or multi-business offers‚Äîall powered by Cardano. The MVP lays the foundation for an entire on-chain commerce ecosystem that expands Cardano‚Äôs reach and utility far beyond the crypto community.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
I have the capability to deliver this project with high levels of trust, accountability, and efficiency due to a combination of real-world entrepreneurial experience, hands-on development knowledge, and a proven track record of building Cardano-based applications. As a long-time Cardano community member and operator of the PARAD stake pool since the ITN era, I have consistently demonstrated reliability, transparency, and follow-through. Over the past several years, I have self-funded multiple Web applications and blockchain integrations, including the OneVote project, which gave me practical experience coordinating developers, designing user flows, and delivering usable tools.



This project leverages an AI-assisted development model, allowing me to dramatically accelerate front-end builds, documentation, smart contract scaffolding, and QA processes. AI tools such as ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot, and Lovable.dev reduce development time by generating components, boilerplate code, architectural patterns, and test cases. This makes the project not only feasible on a lean budget but also faster to deliver with fewer bottlenecks. The remaining mission-critical components‚Äîsmart contract finalization, security validation, and integration‚Äîwill be executed by experienced developers who have already worked with me on prior Cardano projects.



Feasibility is further strengthened by the simplicity of the MVP architecture: three smart contracts (minting, marketplace, redemption), a web dashboard, a consumer marketplace, and the Market Manager system. The ADA-only model eliminates tokenomics, liquidity pools, and regulatory overhead, making the scope tightly focused and highly executable within the 26-week timeline.



To validate the approach, the MVP will be tested on the Cardano testnet with real businesses and Market Managers in Southwest Florida, where I already operate multiple businesses and community networks. Success will be measured through minting tests, QR redemption flow, ADA fee splits, and real-world user feedback. On-chain metrics such as coupon mints, purchases, and redemptions will provide transparent and verifiable proof that the system works as intended before mainnet deployment.



This combination of community trust, real-world business experience, AI-accelerated development, proven collaborators, and a clearly scoped MVP ensures that the project is both technically feasible and highly likely to be completed successfully.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
This project delivers significant value for the Cardano ecosystem by creating a real-world utility application‚ÄîNFT coupons powered entirely by ADA‚Äîat an extremely low cost compared to typical Web3 development. A full end-to-end smart contract system, marketplace, dashboard, and mainnet launch normally represents a budget of $75,000‚Äì$150,000. By leveraging an AI-assisted workflow, careful scope control, and a lean execution strategy, this MVP can be delivered for just $23,000, making it one of the most cost-effective real-world adoption initiatives proposed in this fund.



AI tools reduce development time by generating code scaffolding, UI layouts, documentation, testing scripts, and logic patterns, allowing the project lead and a small developer team to accomplish work that traditionally requires a larger engineering staff. This means Catalyst funding is used efficiently and directly toward deliverables rather than overhead or prolonged development cycles. The project‚Äôs minimal smart contract footprint (minting, marketplace, redemption) ensures both low cost and low risk, while still enabling high-impact real-world use.



The return on investment for Cardano is substantial: every coupon mint, sale, and redemption produces on-chain ADA transactions, increasing network activity and demonstrating practical blockchain use cases. The Market Manager model decentralizes onboarding and creates new earning opportunities within the Cardano community without requiring additional funding. Even a small number of participating businesses will generate recurring ADA usage, reinforcing Cardano‚Äôs position as a platform for real commerce.



For only $23,000, Catalyst receives a publicly accessible mainnet application, open smart contracts, onboarding tools, and a scalable adoption engine that can grow organically through Market Managers. This is high-impact, low-cost, and aligned with Catalyst‚Äôs mission to accelerate ecosystem growth responsibly and sustainably.
